trans-unit.source: The Azure Mobile Services SDK includes a client library for C++ that enables Windows Store development with XAML and C++.
trans-unit.target: The Azure Mobile Services SDK includes a client library for C++ that enables Windows Store development with XAML and C++.

trans-unit.source: This topic provides detailed reference information to use this client library.
trans-unit.target: This topic provides detailed reference information to use this client library.

trans-unit.source: The Mobile Services client library for C++ has been removed from Visual Studio 2015 and is only available in Visual Studio 2013.
trans-unit.target: The Mobile Services client library for C++ has been removed from Visual Studio 2015 and is only available in Visual Studio 2013.

trans-unit.source: The library is not compatible with Azure Mobile Apps.
trans-unit.target: The library is not compatible with Azure Mobile Apps.

trans-unit.source: If you are new to Mobile Services, you should consider first completing one of these Mobile Services quickstarts:
trans-unit.target: If you are new to Mobile Services, you should consider first completing one of these Mobile Services quickstarts:

trans-unit.source: <legacyBold>Quickstart: Adding a mobile service using C++</legacyBold> (<externalLink><linkText>Windows Store</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windows/apps/dn263181.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>)
trans-unit.target: <legacyBold>Quickstart: Adding a mobile service using C++</legacyBold> (<externalLink><linkText>Windows Store</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windows/apps/dn263181.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>)

trans-unit.source: Demonstrates how to use Mobile Services to easily create an app that uses Azure.
trans-unit.target: Demonstrates how to use Mobile Services to easily create an app that uses Azure.

trans-unit.source: <legacyBold>Quickstart: Adding push notifications for a mobile service</legacyBold> (<externalLink><linkText>Windows Store</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn263182.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>)
trans-unit.target: <legacyBold>Quickstart: Adding push notifications for a mobile service</legacyBold> (<externalLink><linkText>Windows Store</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn263182.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>)

trans-unit.source: Demonstrates how to use Mobile Services to send push notifications to your apps.
trans-unit.target: Demonstrates how to use Mobile Services to send push notifications to your apps.

trans-unit.source: These quickstarts give you an easy entry into using the power and convenience of Mobile Services to expand the reach and capabilities of your apps.
trans-unit.target: These quickstarts give you an easy entry into using the power and convenience of Mobile Services to expand the reach and capabilities of your apps.

trans-unit.source: The Mobile Services SDK also includes a .NET library that enables you to create Mobile Services-enabled apps for Windows Store and Windows Phone 8 by using C#, VB, and XAML, and a JavaScript library that enables you to create equivalent Mobile Services-enabled apps by using HTML and JavaScript.
trans-unit.target: The Mobile Services SDK also includes a .NET library that enables you to create Mobile Services-enabled apps for Windows Store and Windows Phone 8 by using C#, VB, and XAML, and a JavaScript library that enables you to create equivalent Mobile Services-enabled apps by using HTML and JavaScript.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <externalLink><linkText>Client library for .NET</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windowsazure/jj863454.aspx</linkUri></externalLink> and <externalLink><linkText>Client library for JavaScript</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windowsazure/jj554207.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <externalLink><linkText>Client library for .NET</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windowsazure/jj863454.aspx</linkUri></externalLink> and <externalLink><linkText>Client library for JavaScript</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windowsazure/jj554207.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: The Mobile Services client library for C++ is implemented in the <legacyLink xlink:href="d84a962d-e47b-4fc1-9651-f57cf0dd2417" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">azure::mobile</legacyLink> namespace.
trans-unit.target: The Mobile Services client library for C++ is implemented in the <legacyLink xlink:href="d84a962d-e47b-4fc1-9651-f57cf0dd2417" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">azure::mobile</legacyLink> namespace.
